shallow copy

只有當list/dictionary, 裡面的元素是單純的atomic types: float, string,....ect. 此時shallow copy無法影響原本的物件。

## 視函數為元素

```{python}
def myfun(x,y):
    return x+y
def myfun2(x,y):
    return x*y
    
dict_myfuns={
    'fun1': myfun,
    'fun2': myfun2
}
```

```{python}
myfun(1,3)
myfun2(2,5)
```

```{python}
myfun(1,3)
dict_myfuns['fun1'](1,3)
myfun2(2,5)
dict_myfuns['fun2'](2,5)
```

```{python}
dict_example = {
    'list': [1, 3, -7, 4, 9, -5, 4],
    'dict': {
        "date": [2001,2002,2003],
        "price": [21000,33000,45880]
        },
    'matrix': [
        [2,5,4],
        [2,-1,3]]
}


print("list")
x=dict_example["list"]
x
[i for i in x]
[i for i in range(len(x))]
[i for i in enumerate(x)] # produce tuple iterates
```

```{python}
print("dict")
x=dict_example["dict"]
x
[i for i in x] # key sequence
[i for i in range(len(x))] # index sequence
[i for i in enumerate(x)] # (index, key) tuple sequence
[i for i in x.items()] # (key, value) tuple sequence
```
